scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible credit scoring API by performing a model inversion attack.  The attacker iteratively probes the API with crafted inputs to infer details about individual customer profiles, violating privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Analyze the publicly available credit scoring API to identify vulnerabilities and potential biases.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A competitor is attempting to reconstruct the internal customer credit scoring model and extract sensitive customer data (e.g., income, address, employment history) to gain a competitive advantage.
